org.contentmine.graphics.svg.text

Class TextCoordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.text.TextCoordinate

  • public class TextCoordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    holds a (double) coordinate for x,y, fontSize, heights, widths, etc. the coordinate is internally scaled by rounding to a given number of places this rounded value is used for binning, maps, sets, etc
    Author:
    pm286 moved from SVG2XML
